lyrics: Careful how you hold me I'm a weapon You can't own me, whao I'm a weapon   I have got enough to make it rain on you I don't need your tools and I don't need your jewels I don't really care what's around your neck I'm just tryna mess with your head   I, I am not the one, I know I'm not the one for you You, you are not the only one, don't trust me like you do, do Treat me like a dream, just know that I won't make it through It'll all be over soon   Now I need you to be careful how you hold me I'm a weapon You can't own me, whao I'm a weapon You gon' get shot down (shot down) Every time you jump me you get shot down (shot down) Watch how you hold me I'm a weapon   I don't believe in coincidence You came here to see me, you were so obsessed Now I've got you thinking you gon' see the rest But I'm just tryna fuck with your head   I am not the one, I know I'm not the one for you You, you are not the only one, don't trust me like you do, do Treat me like a dream, just know that I won't make it through It'll all be over soon   Now I need you to be careful how you hold me I'm a weapon You can't own me, whao I'm a weapon You gon' get shot down (shot down) Every time you jump me you get shot down (shot down) Watch how you hold me I'm a weapon   I'm a weapon, yeah Don't play with me Don't play with me I'm a weapon   Now I need you to be careful how you hold me I'm a weapon You can't own me, whao I'm a weapon You gon' get shot down (shot down) Every time you jump me you get shot down (shot down) Watch how you hold me I'm a weapon
